entry.title: New Direction for NATO Must Make Alliance Relevant in Current Security Environment

link.title: OP-280 | Recasting NATO's Strategic Concept: Possible Directions for the United States

entry.summary: NATO is rethinking its future direction for the first time since the Sept. 11 terrorist attacks, a process that could redirect the Cold War alliance toward contemporary security issues like cyberthreats and piracy, and strengthen its commitment to fragile states like Afghanistan.
